statements: SELECT id, content, tags, category FROM content_tagging;
SELECT content, category, tags, id FROM content_tagging;
SELECT category, content FROM content_tagging;
SELECT id, tags FROM content_tagging;
SELECT content, category, tags FROM content_tagging;
SELECT * FROM content_tagging WHERE category = 'News' ORDER BY content DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, content, tags FROM content_tagging WHERE tags @> ARRAY['travel']::VARCHAR[] ORDER BY id;
SELECT content, tags FROM content_tagging WHERE category IN ('Technology', 'Science') ORDER BY category, content ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM content_tagging ORDER BY category;
SELECT SUM(LENGTH(content)) AS total_content_length FROM content_tagging;
SELECT * FROM content_tags;
SELECT tag_name FROM tags WHERE tag_id = 1;
SELECT content_id, tag_id FROM content_tags ORDER BY content_id DESC, tag_id ASC;
SELECT tag_id, tag_name FROM tags WHERE tag_name LIKE '%example%';
SELECT DISTINCT content_id FROM content_tags;
SELECT content_id, tag_id FROM content_tags WHERE tag_id = 1;
SELECT tag_name FROM tags WHERE tag_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM content_tags WHERE content_id = 3 AND tag_id = 4;
SELECT tag_name, content_id FROM tags JOIN content_tags ON tags.tag_id = content_tags.tag_id;
SELECT content_id, tag_id FROM content_tags WHERE content_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY tag_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM content_tags;
SELECT content_id, tag_name FROM content_tags WHERE content_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT content_id, tag_name FROM content_tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT tag_name, COUNT(*) AS tag_count FROM tags GROUP BY tag_name;
SELECT * FROM content_tags WHERE tag_name = 'example';
SELECT content_id FROM content_tags WHERE tag_name LIKE '%tag';
SELECT content_id, tag_name FROM content_tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT tag_name FROM tags;
SELECT content_id, tag_id FROM tag_relations WHERE content_id = 'abc123' AND tag_id = 'def456';
SELECT * FROM ContentTags;
SELECT tag_name FROM ContentTags WHERE content_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT category_name FROM ContentCategories WHERE category_id = '87654321-4321-8765-4321-876543218765';
SELECT content_id, tag_name FROM ContentTagMapping WHERE tag_name = 'example_tag';
SELECT content_id, category_id FROM ContentCategoryMapping WHERE category_id = '54321678-2143-5678-2143-567821435678';
SELECT content_id, tag_name FROM ContentTags
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM ContentCategories
SELECT content_id, category_id FROM ContentCategoryMapping
SELECT content_id, tag_name FROM ContentTagMapping WHERE content_id = '123'
SELECT tag_name, category_name FROM ContentTags JOIN ContentCategories ON ContentTags.tag_name = ContentCategories.category_name
SELECT * FROM content_tags;
SELECT tag_name FROM content_tags WHERE id = 1;
SELECT category_name, id FROM categories ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT content, tag_id FROM tagged_contents WHERE tag_id = 2;
SELECT title, description FROM content_details WHERE content_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM content_tags WHERE id = 1;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE id = 3;
SELECT content, tag_name FROM tagged_contents JOIN content_tags ON tagged_contents.tag_id = content_tags.id;

SELECT category_name, content, description FROM categories JOIN content_category_map ON categories.id = content_category_map.category_id JOIN content_details ON content_category_map.content_id = content_details.content_id;

SELECT DISTINCT c.category_name, t.tag_name FROM categories c JOIN content_category_map m ON c.id = m.category_id JOIN tagged_contents t ON m.content_id = t.id ORDER BY c.category_name, t.tag_name ASC;
